divs: Sighting Detailswell me and my best friend were fishing at the rock quarry ( late nite early a.m.) . it was time to go home so we started up the side of the steep hill . i was talking about something when i hear "look dick" i look at my buddy his eyes fixed at a spot in the sky so i look up . "Oh a hang glider" i said and i get a answer " at night ass hole!" call me im not good at typeing
trends: There has been one other sighting in Irwindale
There were no other sightings in Irwindale on or around May 7th 2009
